solution.text:
Diameter of hemisphere\(=_{j}_\)cm\(\Rightarrow\)Radius,r\(=_{{j/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Total surface area of a hemisphere\(=3\pi r^2\)
\(=3\pi \times _{{j/Decimal(2)}}_^2\)
\(=_{{trunc(((3/Decimal(4))*pi_val*j*j),3)}}_cm^2\)

content.text: The total surface area of a hemisphere of diameter \(_{j}_\)cm.
